title: Frosted
desc:
- ❄️ cards may be placed on <:blue:1106234079055200378>, ❄️, <:cyan:1106716163184009277> or <:lightblue:1120572625865949194> cards.
- Any player targeted by ❄️ cards are afflicted with Frozen before any effects of said card takes place.
- When a player is frozen, one of their cards is frozen in place, unable to be played as their main card for their turn.
- The frozen card may only be played as the main card if the only cards left in the players hand are frozen cards.
